Effortlessly install professionally designed HTML email signatures into your favorite webmail client with our simple to use Chrome extension.

With just a few clicks, you can have your email signature working in major webmail client providers including Gmail, Outlook Office 365, Yahoo Mail, and AOL Mail.

Our Key Features include...

üëè Simple Installation:
No more complex code edits. Just select your webmail client, enter your signature key (for paid members) or your HTML signature code, and save.

üìß Seamless Integration:
Supports major webmail providers including Gmail, Outlook Office 365, Yahoo Mail, and AOL Mail.

üîÅ Automatic Updates:
Paid Email Signature Rescue members will enjoy automatic signature updates. Any changes made to your signature in your Email Signature Rescue account are instantly reflect in your webmail client.

üëåMultiple Signature Support:
Set up and manage different signatures for various email accounts, whether they be for the same webmail client, or different webmail clients.

üíª Custom HTML Signatures:
Have your own HTML code that you've created yourself? We support using HTML code as well, just hit Advanced Settings and paste.

üëÅÔ∏è Live Preview: See how your signature will appear before sending an email, ensuring it looks perfect every time.

Want a professional email signature that always remains on-brand? Head over to emailsignaturerescue.com and check out our full list of features.


***********************

IMPORTANT: 
This extension is 100% free to use if you paste in your own HTML code into the extension. Our Software is a paid product which lets you create, design and manage HTML email signatures online via our app and and our API pushes updates automatically from the ESR Dashboard to the extension. 

You can choose to use the extension for free and paste your own HTML, or if you are a paid member you can utilize additional upgraded features.

***********************

Continually Supported and Regularly Updated
Email clients are constantly being updated by their Developers. As part of our ongoing service and commitment to our Users (both paid and free), we try and keep up with the changes as much as humanly possible.

However sometimes email clients are updated without us knowing and conflicts occur between our browser extensions or HTML code in general.

We work hard to keep up with the updates, supporting over 60+ email clients, apps and software on Windows, MacOS, Browser, iOS and Android. If something isn't working or stops working all of a sudden, please contact support and let us know and we will do our best to fix it as soon as humanly possible.
